Reference

read and write brain images

read and write 3D or 4D NIFTI neuroimaging files into R

read_vol()

Load an image volume from a file

write_vol()

write a 3d image volume to disk

read_vec()

read_vec

write_vec()

write a 4d image vector to disk

read_header()

read header information of an image file

constructor function for 2D, 3D, and 4D imaging data structures.

Construct a NeuroSlice object

NeuroVol()

Construct a NeuroVol object

SparseNeuroVol()

SparseNeuroVol

ClusteredNeuroVol()

ClusteredNeuroVol

SparseNeuroVec

NeuroVecSeq()

Create an NeuroVecSeq instance for a variable length list of NeuroVec objects.

MappedNeuroVec

get information about data structures

Functions to access information about the shape, size, and structure of images

space()

extract geometric properties of an image.

ndim()

extract the number of dimensions of an object

spacing()

extract the voxel dimensions of an image

which_dim()

find dimensions of a given axis

dim_of()

get dimensions of an axis

axes()

extract image axes

bounds()

extract the spatial bounds (origin + dim * spacing) of an image param x the object

origin()

extract image origin

trans()

extract image coordinate transformation

voxels()

extract voxel coordinates

centroid()

return the centroid of an object

centroids()

return a matrix of centroids of an object

querying, dividing, slicing, and extracting data from image data structures

Functions to extract portions of data or split up data into sub-regions for further processing

vols()

extract an ordered series of 3d volumes

vectors()

extract an ordered list of 1d vectors

split_clusters()

cut an object into a list of spatial or spatiotemporal clusters

split_blocks()

cut a vector-valued object into a list of sub-blocks

patch_set()

Extract set of patches

slices()

extract an ordered series of 2d slices

series_roi() series()

Extract one or more series from object and return as ROI object

partition()

partition an image into a set of disjoint clusters

sub_vector()

Generic function to extract a sub-vector from a NeuroVec object.

searchlight functions

Functions to support “searchlight” analyses of image data

bootstrap_searchlight() searchlight_coords() searchlight() clustered_searchlight()

bootstrap_searchlight

random_searchlight()

random_searchlight
